Room.Name: Hall of Heros
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Hall of Heros in Castle Ragnar.
Room.LongDescription: Oil paintings of famous fighters and paladins are on the wall, each hung above a huge chair sitting on a raised dais. The ceiling is so high above that birds fly about the room, nesting in crannies and niches. The floor has a rich multi-hued oriental rug running the length of the hall. To the east is the throne room of Prince Ragnar.
